message: My turn. Let's be reasonable. This offer is better for both of us in the long run.
Come on, meet me in the middle!
Okay, let's split it evenly. 50/50. This is the fairest deal.
I'll give you a little more, but I still think I deserve the bigger share!
Alice, time is running out. Take this deal while it's still good. I won't offer more.
